DetailedCombatResults.ChooseData: Choose which data you would like to build a Combat Report for:
DetailedCombatResults.NoData: No saved combat results, fight some battles!
DetailedCombatResults.PlayerResultsText: Fleet %4$s(%1$s ships / %2$s deployment points) %3$s total damage delivered%5$s
DetailedCombatResults.EnemyResultsText: %1$s %7$s(%2$s ships / %3$s deployment points) %4$s, %5$s total damage delivered over %6$s seconds
DetailedCombatResults.SoloDesc: Solo Kill: When a firing ship does more than %s%% of the total armor & hull damage done to a target
DetailedCombatResults.AssistDesc: Kill Assist: When a firing ship does more than %s%% of the total armor & hull damage done to a target, and is not a solo kill
DetailedCombatResults.ProRataDpDesc: DP/Pro Rata DP: The amount of deployment points destroyed based on fraction of armor and hull damage inflicted on destroyed ships
DetailedCombatResults.DamageDesc: Ship damage indicator overlay size is based on the amount of armor & hull damage done to a target (larger = more)
DetailedCombatResults.UnderPerformance: Weapon Under Performing Damage as a % of OP Font Color
DetailedCombatResults.OverPerformance: Weapon Over Performing Damage as a % of OP Font Color
